title.narrative: Department of Energy, Seismic Cooperation Program in the Middle East and North Africa

description.narrative: The award funds U.S. National Laboratory and U.S. university expert engagement building seismic monitoring capacity with institutes in the Middle East and North Africa. Outreach includes training, joint data analysis, seismometer deployment and performance improvement, and collaborative research and data analysis.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Janice Rivera and Melodie Washington; Ryan Bol
